## GeoCoordinates.fromLatLng() method

Creates a \[\[GeoCoordinates\]\] from a \[\[LatLngLike\]\] literal.

```typescript
const center = { lat: 53.3, lng: 13.4 };
mapView.geoCenter = GeoCoordinates.fromLatLng(center);

```

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static fromLatLng(latLng: LatLngLike): GeoCoordinates;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  latLng | [LatLngLike](./harp-geoutils.latlnglike.md) | A \[\[LatLngLike\]\] object literal. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[GeoCoordinates](./harp-geoutils.geocoordinates.md)
